Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
src.models.Account
src.models.BankAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountVerifiable, TransactionLoggable
public class BankAccount extends Account
Represents a standard bank account

    • logTransaction

      public void logTransaction(String transactionType, double amount, String description)
      Withdraws money from the account with daily limit checks
      Parameters:
      transactionType - the type of transaction (e.g., deposit, withdrawal).
      amount - the amount to withdraw
      description - a description of the transaction.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the withdrawal cannot be processed
